Translations.Text: Tadera puraskara rayeche tadera prabhura kache -- nandanakananasamuha, tadera nica diye baye caleche jharanaraji, sekhane tara abasthana karabe cirakala. Allah tadera upare santasta ara tara santasta tamra prati. E'iti tara jan'ya ye tara prabhuke bhaya kare.
Prthibi yakhana kampita habe apana kampane
ara prthibi bera kare debe tara bojhagula
Se'idina se barnana karabe tara kahinigulo
yena tomara prabhu take prerana diyechena.
Se'idina manusera dale-dale beriye parabe yena tadera dekhano yete pare tadera kriyakalapa.
Takhana ye ke'u eka anu-parimana satkaja kareche se ta dekhate pabe
ara ye ke'u eka anu-parimana mandakaja kareche se'o ta dekhate pabe.
phale yara agunera phulaki chore aghatera chote
ara tara phale yara dhulo uraya
takhana era phale sain'yadalake bheda kare yaya.
Manusa niscaya'i tara prabhura prati bara akrtajna
ara se alabat e bisaye abasya pratyaksadasa.
Ara nihsandeha se dhanasampadera mohe duranta.
Tabe ki se jane na yakhana kabaraguloya ya ache ta tola habe
